Dustin Roe

About Me

A full-stack developer who is passionate about well thought out design and UI's that navigate with ease. A perfect blend of creativity, energy, communication, clarity and restraint. An avid gamer, film nerd, and urban-rec enthusiast.'

Comic Sans

A app that utilizes Canvas to allow users to collaborate on comic strips together. Heavy on the front end and UI experience.

Putrid Kale

First Rails app mocked after Rotten Tomatoes website (except only with good films)

Music Wall

An app to share songs through embedded youtube videos and then vote on favorties. My first implementation of Sinatra and ActiveRecord. Styled with Bootsrap.js
